name: Hilda III
description:
Hilda III is a 2D platformer inspired by the likes of Celeste, Ori and the Blind Forest, and New Super Mario Bros.  You control a fox and will have to jump, climb, glide, burst, and more to get through the levels the game throws your way.  You start with only basic movement, but by the end you'll have lots of cool ways of traversing each level.  This game was a lot of fun to make, and I hope you enjoy playing it!

This game was made with a gamepad in mind.  It has full support for keyboard and mouse but a gamepad is still the best way to play it.

Note about the name: this game began as a spiritual successor to some school projects I made, and I named it as a sequel to them.  However, this is a standalone game and is not related to any of my previous games.
